Posts.Content: Feb 23, 2009 08:58PM Suee wrote: Hi this is the first time I have looked at this site.  Can anyone tell me which US health insurance providers will pay for the BRAC test? I have just been told by Myriad that Golden Rule will only pay when I have been diagnosed with either breast or ovarian cancer?? My mother had breast cancer at 48 my middle sister at 41 and my eldest sister has just been diagnosed at the age of 57.  I am keen to have the test but cant pay the $3000+
